Class HTMLExporter¶

class app.impex.HTMLExporter(path, entries)[source]¶

Bases: app.impex.Exporter

Export a list of Entries to an HTML file in the default style.

__init__(path, entries)[source]¶
Parameters:
  • path (str) – The path to a file.
  • entries (list of app.entry.Entry) – The list of entries to export.
_exportEntry(entry)[source]¶

Export to HTML following the default style. :rtype: int :return: The total number of entries successfully exported. :raises: Exception: If an error occurred during the export process.

_postprocess()[source]¶
_preprocess()[source]¶
